about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign tells drivers to be alert to crossing pedestrians.

comment.text: Pedestrian crossing.
School crossing.
Jogging trail.
Pedestrian crossing.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign tells drivers to be alert to crossing pedestrians.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign tells drivers to be alert to crossing pedestrians.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Orange is the standard color for work zone activity. If you see orange signs, cones, or barrels while driving, stay alert and be prepared for unexpected driving conditions. This sign alerts drivers to an upcoming flagger whose directions should be obeyed by all drivers.

comment.text: Flagger ahead.
Turn left at the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Last turn before a toll road.

comment.text: Last turn before a toll road.
Flagger ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Orange is the standard color for work zone activity. If you see orange signs, cones, or barrels while driving, stay alert and be prepared for unexpected driving conditions. This sign alerts drivers to an upcoming flagger whose directions should be obeyed by all drivers.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Orange is the standard color for work zone activity. If you see orange signs, cones, or barrels while driving, stay alert and be prepared for unexpected driving conditions. This sign alerts drivers to an upcoming flagger whose directions should be obeyed by all drivers.

hasPart.name: Three of the most important times to check for traffic behind you are before:

about.name: Three of the most important times to check for traffic behind you are before:

hasPart.assesses: Three of the most important times to check for traffic behind you are before: | Three of the most important times to check for traffic behind you are before: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is important to check behind you before changing lanes, reducing your speed, backing up, or driving down a long or steep hill.

suggestedAnswer.text: Backing, making a sharp turn, or crossing an intersection.

comment.text: Backing, making a sharp turn, or crossing an intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Backing, changing lanes, or slowing down quickly.

comment.text: Backing, changing lanes, or slowing down quickly.

suggestedAnswer.text: Changing lanes, crossing intersections, or slowing down quickly.

comment.text: Changing lanes, crossing intersections, or slowing down quickly.

acceptedAnswer.text: Backing, changing lanes, or slowing down quickly.

comment.text: Backing, changing lanes, or slowing down quickly.

answerExplanation.text: It is important to check behind you before changing lanes, reducing your speed, backing up, or driving down a long or steep hill.

comment.text: Three of the most important times to check for traffic behind you are before: | It is important to check behind you before changing lanes, reducing your speed, backing up, or driving down a long or steep hill.

hasPart.name: Backing your vehicle is:
hasPart.assesses: Backing your vehicle is: | Backing your vehicle is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Backing up is always dangerous because it is hard to see behind your vehicle. Use extra caution when backing up.

comment.text: Always dangerous.

suggestedAnswer.text: Dangerous if you have a helper.

comment.text: Dangerous if you have a helper.
Only dangerous in large vehicles.
Always dangerous.

answerExplanation.text: Backing up is always dangerous because it is hard to see behind your vehicle. Use extra caution when backing up.

hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A warning sign is usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns that the number of lanes ahead is reduced and that traffic will need to merge to the left.

comment.text: Road widens ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Lane reduction. The right lane ends soon and traffic should merge left.

comment.text: Lane reduction. The right lane ends soon and traffic should merge left.
Highway entrance ramp ahead.

acceptedAnswer.text: Lane reduction. The right lane ends soon and traffic should merge left.

comment.text: Lane reduction. The right lane ends soon and traffic should merge left.

hasPart.name: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine:

about.name: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine:

hasPart.assesses: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine: | You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: By driving in California, you consent to have your breath, blood, or urine tested if you are arrested for suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you have been drinking alcohol.

comment.text: Only if you have been drinking alcohol.
Whenever you drive in California.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you have a collision.

comment.text: Only if you have a collision.
Whenever you drive in California.

answerExplanation.text: By driving in California, you consent to have your breath, blood, or urine tested if you are arrested for suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs.

comment.text: You consent to take a chemical test for the alcohol content of your blood, breath, or urine: | By driving in California, you consent to have your breath, blood, or urine tested if you are arrested for suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs.
